Articles.Content:
Is there a mod (or some other way) to have more music? I like the KSP Music, but it gets on my nerves after a while. It would be nice to substitute every KSP Track with a random selection of Songs.

Yes, listening to external Music is of course the simplest method, but I would love having different selections for different situations (like the stock tracks).
Thanks, I'll have a look at it.
